ARABIC: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is the Day of Decision you used to deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Yes,) this is the Day of Judgement you had called a lie."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: “Yes, this is the Day of Final Decision that you used to deny as a lie.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is the Day of Judgment in which you disbelieved.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “This is the Day of Judgement, which you used to deny!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (It will be said:) "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is the day of the judgment which you called a lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is the Day of Decision, even that you cried lies to.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This is the Day of Separation, which ye used to deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [It will be said], "This is the Day of Judgement which you have been denying."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This is the Day of Judgment which ye were wont to belie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘This is the Day of Judgement that you used to deny!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (A voice will say,) "This is the Day of Sorting Out, whose truth ye (once) denied!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (It will be said): "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is the Day of Decision which you belied.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “This is the Day of Separation which you used to deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [They will be told], "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:21] ‘This is the Day of Judgement, between [all] creatures, that you used to deny!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And the angels will say to them: (This is the Day of Separation) the Day of Judgement between you and the believers, (which ye used to deny) in the life of this world.
